name: Cristoforo Colombo American Cup
overview: In March 1985 the four-monthly periodical Mondosoft of Edizioni Elettroniche Mondadori published supplement number 3, entitled "Cristoforo Colombo American Cup". Inside it was included an Italian language adventure video game, designed specifically for the Commodore 64 and inspired by the authentic crossing of Christopher Columbus. The aim of the game is to guide the convoy of boats towards the coasts of America, following the historic route between pitfalls to overcome, managing the crew, the stocks and the days of travel between historical reality and imagination.
